website_summaries.verdict: A perfect way to create a well-hydrated, ultra-smooth base for your foundation.
pros: Hydrating primer gives skin a glowing, dewy finish
Provides a smooth, even surface for foundation
Doesn’t cling to dry patches of skin
A little primer goes a long way
Sits at a low price point
cons: Pump lid becomes less effective toward the end of the bottle

website_summaries.verdict: Infused with vitamins A, C, and E, as well as grape for an illuminating complexion boost.
pros: A great choice for sensitive skin, since this is free from phthalates, sulfates, and parabens
Smooths out pores and gives a moisture boost for smoother makeup
cons: Takes a while to dry after applying
The packaging is deceiving for the amount of product in the bottle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product that I usually buy from ELF store
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I usually buy from ELF store. The one that I received from Amazon smells like grease, the smell was so bad that I had to wash my face right away. I wanted to return it and it says "Not eligible for return". I buy a lot from Amazon and this had never happened to me before. I will have to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving botttle
customer_reviews.text: The primer is okay but the bottle is VERY deceiving. I have attached photos showing that the green core doesn't contain the primer. As you can see there is no plastic "straw" that reaches down into the bottle because it doesn't. It's cheap for a reason. I use other elf proud he but this one is truly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control - Smelled like it had gone bad
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought it from Amazon, it was fine. The second time I bought from Amazon, it smelled rancid - as if one of the oils in it had gone bad. I normally like this product - I had bought it at Target several times before purchasing it from Amazon. I think I'll go back to buying it at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Elf, I tried to like you...but greasy and yuck!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a Silicone free primer. "Becca".. and used them side by side...for two days,.... Elf on the right side, and Becca on the left side. My Right side.(the elf)..appeared cakey after the day progressed, I had some break out, everything else was the same. Moisturizers, foundation and setting spray. My silicone "free" side felt like my face could breath my Elf side felt more layer on... and greasy, REALLY REALLY GREASY!! Like liquid plastic mixed with grease! I've had better silicone based primers Perscriptives "the present" was better, and DHC brand. Sorry Elf, I tried to like you....but yuck!!!! and it didn't hold up. Going to throw this junk away!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Had my face looking absolutely gorg! Packaging and bottle also looks very professional
customer_reviews.author: Glenniece Baillou

customer_reviews.title: I've sampled a pricey primer at Sephora and while it was nice, I didn't really want to spend a whole ...
customer_reviews.text: Because of hormonal changes, my skin has been on the dry side lately so I opted for a hydrating primer. I've sampled a pricey primer at Sephora and while it was nice, I didn't really want to spend a whole lot of money for it. I came across this primer and saw decent reviews here and on other sites so I gave it a try. I must say, it is very close to the expensive line I tried and did not irritate my skin at all. It is hydrating where it did not make my foundation crack and my make up held pretty well for a few hours. Not bad for the price and does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: lacali

customer_reviews.title: I love top dollar make-up products if it does top dollar ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this primer from now on! I love top dollar make-up products if it does top dollar work, however, I love saving my dollar if I can find a nice over the counter or drugstore product that does the same job, if not better! Other reviews talked about this primer having a terrible smell. Honestly, it does have a "particular" smell to it, but I wouldn't call it bad at all. Maybe more along the lines of a plastic smell..but again, I wouldn't consider it bad. I've been spending about $30 on primers and I won't be doing that anymore now that I have Elf in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I was quite excited to try this primer after reading so many positive reviews. However, this product just didn't work so well for me. I knew that it took a little while to dry after applying, but it just felt gummy to me. I would apply, go downstairs, fix a breakfast drink, then return upstairs to put on foundation and the rest of my makeup and the primer still didn't feel 'well-set.' I'm a huge advocate of reading reviews for products, but in this case my experience didn't match the positives experienced by many others. It might be skin type, medications, who-knows-what that impacted the product so negatively. This is not a product I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SKML

customer_reviews.title: I really  would not want to be without it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product for older dryer skin. I do not want to be without it. I'm 78, have had cancer and chemo, am in remission for 2 yrs. My make-up just laid on my skin. It was awful. I started using this under my make-up a couple months ago. On Mother's day, my DAUGHTER asked what I was doing because my skin and make up looked great. My makeup goes on like it should and doesn't cake it lay on my skin. I always have 2 or 3 bottles on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as in the drug store.
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this product from Walmart. It was cheaper on Amazon so I chose to order it. I ended up throwing this out. The consistency was a total liquid, not the gel like consistency that I have always known this product to be. I shook up the product and still watery. It is a nonreturnable product. Very disappointed. I am guessing that this product is old and has been on the shelf for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Instant Bad Reaction!!
customer_reviews.text: Within seconds of making contact with my skin, my entire face and neck swelled up and it felt like I was on fire!!! I had to take Benadryl and it took about an hour for the swelling to go down!
customer_reviews.author: CMeyer

customer_reviews.title: Rated one of the best face primers available!
customer_reviews.text: I literally swear by this primer and am very happy about the decent price! I’m 61 and I still wear makeup every day. Before I started using the primer that all these makeup gurus recommend, any liquid or powder foundation I used would sink into my facial pores and along wrinkle lines! Once I added a primer to my makeup routine I was a bit angry that I went for so long before trying it! I did spend some time researching the best rated primers and this little bottle of e.l.f. primer was rated just under the most expensive ones but priced the lowest! Can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: SILVERSTEIN'S MARKETPLACE

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Dear lord I must have gotten a bad one or all these reviews are lies. Shook it up before using it and it came out just straight oil and it smells absolutely awful like deep fryer grease that has been usedrepeatedly, its absolutely gross. For some reason I decide to put it on my face anyway and now I have a rash and smell like a dirty deep fryer. It has also dried my skin out way worse than it usually is. Pretty disgusted with elf products at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Geer

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This budget primer really doesn't feel budget. It's smooth, scentless, and does not affect the tone of my foundation, other than maybe providing some evenness. My skin is drier than it used to be, and this hydrating primer really does help foundation go on smoothly. I use liquid foundation, but this dries to a powder-like finish, and I think it would work with any type foundation.
customer_reviews.author: C.Marie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Makes your face shine but in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer. It does make my face shine but not in an oily way. Like a nice glow. I got compliments a couple of times the first week I started using it. It is not the best to cover up pores so I combine it with another primer from Nivea. It is small but you do not need to use a lot of product. I applied it by mistake under my eyes and I got a tingling feeling and redness for an hour or so. So beware if you have a sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer for my makeup routine
customer_reviews.text: I adore this primer!!! I have acne and most make up causes me to break out worse and doesn’t cover pimples without making them look crusty. This primer was a game changer! Make up looks flawless over the primer and it keeps my pores from becoming clogged with make up. It feels silky going on! I wouldn’t think of wearing make up without it!
customer_reviews.author: Ananda Jolemore-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smells......greasy.
customer_reviews.text: It does hydrate, I guess, and that is what it is supposed to do. But it smells awful. I don't know how to describe the smell other than "greasy". It is not a sweet smell or necessarily a bad smell, but it is strong and I don't like the smell so I find myself going back to use up the last of my Revlon primer. It also felt greasy to me. I am 58 with very dry skin, and might benefit from using this, but I just don't know if I can make myself do so. It also seems to "slippery" to use as a primer.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It actually Reduce fine lines and wrinkles in a softer way
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like about this primer? It does everything that it says it’s going to do and more! I have never ever ever ever ever ever found a primer that will soften up my wrinkles plus moisturize my face at the same time! At six dollars a bottle I thought why not give it a shot I am mediately ordered two more bottles that same day after trying it on! It makes your skin feel and look so soft I honestly believe that the lines and wrinkles were diminishing. I also put on ELF foundation.. They pair Really well together!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane & Brian

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is pretty deceptive. Obviously you know by the
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is pretty deceptive. Obviously you know by the .47 ounce, you won't be receiving a ton of product. But the way it's packaged will lead you to believe it will last a while. This bottle lasted me under a month - I liked it well enough, but I don't want to have to rebuy it constantly. It's weird to waste so much plastic on this large bottle when the amount inside is like not even 1/3 of the size of the bottle. Takes up unnecessary room in my makeup bag for no apparent reason, other than to trick you into thinking you're getting more primer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and coverage...twice.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product three times. I have order the regular E.L.F primer before too. It has always been fine. This is the second time that this product has been what I think is 'old'. It separates in the bottle and instead of giving a smooth primer, it comes out of pump runny and oily. I can only assume it's that the product is past shelf-life. I won't order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Might Work For You, But Definetly Didn't For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this primer because I suffer from dry skin and wanted something that would keep my face hydrated and looking it's best. Besides the awful smell that you can be sure no one is going to enjoy, it left my skin looking greasy after just one pump. What was supposed to be light makeup application looked like I had caked on multiple layers and was melting off my skin. Keep in mind all makeup and makeup accessories are trial and error basis. What works for one person might not work for another. So keep an open mind when buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love that this primer also acts as a moisturizer. I used to need to put on a layer of moisturizer before my primer (I have skin somewhere between dry and normal). This doesn't make me break out and has made my skin noticeably softer. The longevity it offers is similar to other primers, but it is far cheaper than ones of comparable quality. I really cannot recommend this enough to people who need a good primer and also want glowing skin!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it at all. I do my normal routine before putting make up but this really leaves the face so wet. Especially if you put it on top of a moisturizer. It's similar to baby skin poreless by maybeline but I think that one dries up better. This one really even after setting it just wipes off so easy because it's so wet.
customer_reviews.author: DiaCallawayAmazon

customer_reviews.title: WOW POWER
customer_reviews.text: I set out to return this but thank my lucky stars couldn't. Wow! I have Smashbox and this is better. It is a small amount in the bottle but my goodness look at the price! This is wonderful. Covers nose pores, fine lines, moisturizes and does it all for me without feeling greasy. Moisturizer first for my dry skin, then ELF, then true match foundation. Geeeze it looks professional. I really like this and am now a fan. It came nicely packaged and quickly. So Glad I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a silicone feel!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt moisturize at all. Has a very silicone feel to it. Leaves skin feeling “slick” and like it can’t breath. If your looking also for a primer that enhances your “glow” this isn’t it either. I guess makeup stayed on ok, but with all the other factors included, I would have to pass
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating, yes. Helps makeup stay in place/last, no.
customer_reviews.text: This product is certainly hydrating, but I’m not sure I would consider it a primer. It doesn’t exactly help makeup stay in place or last any longer. So at the end of the night when I caught the reflection of my Picasso-esque face in the bathroom mirror I was certainly disappointed. But man was my skin hydrated and smooth. Trying a different primer so I don’t feel like I’m applying makeup to a desert covered by an oil slick.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Y Mous

customer_reviews.title: Runs out VERY quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like how quickly the bottle ran out when I didn't even use it everyday... it makes it look like theres more inside than there really is unless I just got a defected bottle. I only use it if I'm going out somewhere nice which is rarely ever. When I went to go use it last night I couldnt and I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Elf is an awesome brand for everything and cheap and cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: This little sucker right here is very heavy and thick at first but than it like drys out and its just soft and leightweight. My makeup stays on all day& night & believe i overdo it sometimes lol and i have hooded eyes so my shadow, liner,mascara all usually smear or something but it doesnt with this! I absolutely love me some elf produ ts
customer_reviews.author: telnisha

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO OILY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good grief is this stuff OILY!!! I’m actually using it as cuticle softener and I’ve even put it on the heels of my feet to help w/the dry, rough skin from wearing sandals. Seriously, if you have ANY issues w/oily skin, please don’t purchase this as a primer to wear under your makeup because it will cause you all sorts of problems. My makeup nearly slid right off my face!! It’s true what they say, “you get what you pay for”!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Litterio

customer_reviews.title: It’s the primer...half the amount though
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the primer HOWEVER, the bottles that I keep getting only last a few weeks. This most recent purchase, I opened it up and looked and compared it to one I purchased locally and it was half the amount as the one purchased locally. I’m not happy about it so I won’t be buying this on amazon any more
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Serrano-Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Not oily, perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with a dry face and this primer worked great! I've used other primers before n it made my face oily. This one hydrated my skin and was a great primer b4 putting on foundations. Def didn't feel oily. Smooth and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sulee S.

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the better primers out there
customer_reviews.text: For the price tag, this is one of the better primers out there. It goes on smooth and even and leaves the face feeling silky smooth and a nice base to apply make up. I have used nicer primers than this, but they come with a heftier price tag. So for the money, these Elf primers are where it's at. Tip- it may feel a little oily at first application but actually makes for a smooth and nicely blendable surface to apply makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glides on!
customer_reviews.text: I may purchase this on the regular. You get a lot for the price as you should only need one or 2 squirts a day to make it last. I would recommend shaking it before each use. It is thinner than some primers I have and I like this. It glides on. Helps any other makeup stay in place as long as you do not use too much of this at a time. Glad I went for it. I am finding there are a lot of primers out there at a high cost and often I feel buyer's remorse. Not this time!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt mix well with liquid foundation
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE primer idk why it has great reviews this primer doesnt help my makeup be any smoother or nothing....it just looks bad with liquid foundation . It doesnt do anything it seems like i honestly look the same with my makeup on without primer. I threw mine out silicone ingredients is NOT for the face people just a fyi! Im going to try nxy oil primer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product was not good at all.. I applied and allowed time to dry a bit (about 30 secs) then applied my amazing Foundation that I have never had issues with and once I was applying Blush with a brush ( as always) all of my foundation melted off my face with each stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I've never used another primer, so I can't speak to the quality of the product from that standpoint. I do like the way it feels on my skin. I think it does a good job of smoothing out my face, as I have a lot of bumps and things that need help. I don't think you can go wrong with this product for the money. I'm sure it isn't as effective as a more expensive price, but again, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Payton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will keep using it even though it’s smells like stale oil. The scent goes away when you put it on your face so it’s bearable but would love it if the my could put a scent in it. It leave me skin smooth and ready for my makeup rituals. It seems to last all day and doesn’t clog my pours. It’s a light product that leave my face felling like silk.
customer_reviews.author: K Petty

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for dry skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m 24 years old, and I have super bad dry skin. I have bought every hydrating foundation on the markets. This ELF primer has brought a HUGE miracle into my life. After I put this on my face my foundation goes on smooth as butter. This makes foundation go on without creating harsh lines, or wrinkles! I won’t ever go without this again. So, so, happy this helped with my dry face!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Miller

customer_reviews.title: I don't see a difference?
customer_reviews.text: I used this pretty consistently both under and over moisturizer and did not see a difference in my skin texture nor my makeup staying power. It has a very silicone texture (which I'm fine with) but for some of my friends who are very sensitive, they didn't like it at all. It didn't break me out at all (thank goodness) but I wouldn't recommend it as I am sure there are better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: HoolioCZ

customer_reviews.title: It’s a MUST
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell too good (but it’s not supposed to I don’t think) it’s more of a plain smell, nothing chemical. HOWEVER It combined with my daily moisturizer and my dewy setting spray gives me the moisturized look I shoot for daily. It’s a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Haley bee

customer_reviews.title: Primer make skin feel like velvet
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin with lines and this primer makes my skin feel like velvet when I have a product on top. It doesn’t let the product get into all of my lines. Cannot say enough about this product after trying many primers.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Love

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. My sister has been trying to get me to use a primer for years, but I never really thought about it. I've been wearing more makeup than before (yay 30s) and I finally learned how amazing primer is! I use so much less make up. This is light and easy to use. I put it on after my lotion and before my makeup. I have sensitive skin and have never had as issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Must Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So, I have dry skin. Usually, whenever I use primer I somehow find ones that are too oily, but this one is perfect! I left like it were the right thing to do before my make up after using it just once. You ever did your make up, and felt the product wasn't the best but you used it anyway to prime your face?? This one you wouldn't wanna go without. If I ever done my make up without it, **which I wont** I 'd feel like my make up is incomplete, and have worries about how my face looks while I'm out!
customer_reviews.author: IG habitsofdiamond

customer_reviews.title: This primer is AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so relieved! Buying makeup online can be a bit scary, as opposed to hands-on in the store. However, one of the key elements of a good primer (in my opinion), is how light it feels on the skin. While, yes, it fills in pores and cracks, it shouldn't feel heavy like spackle! It should fill in where you need, but still feel like you have nothing on before you add your foundation and makeup. Sounds too good to be true? Well, this primer nailed it! It's not only light and does it's job, it's refreshing! A smooth, cool, satin feeling that disappears instantly. I nearly forgot I put it on, until I looked in the mirror! Wow!
customer_reviews.author: K_Tenn

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try out a new primer. I haven't been able to use it more than a couple of times because the smell is awful. It reminds me of plastic and not something I want on my face. I don't know if I just got a bad one or if the product normally smells like this. Thankfully it wasn't expensive but yeah, a waste of money regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not what it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I took stars away . I love this product & it last a long time , but the last two got smell like rancid oil Still works , but I’m disappointed. Also , the little jar is not fully filled I took the lid off & wow , it’s just half full! I love it , & it’s not expensive , but I feel cheated. Time to look for something similar .
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA ALMONTE

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite primer, but useful for other purposes
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for mixing into eyeshadows and the like to create a gel/paste kind of color to apply to your face but not my favorite primer. The primer is very thick and silicon-like and doesn't react well with all of my makeup products (especially foundation). With certain products it will bead up or make my makeup application patchy. However I really love mixing it with other products to create gel for fake freckles etc.
customer_reviews.author: ellen stohl

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product.  Sensitive skin people
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy , if you have sensitive skin. Its leaves your skin dry, ashy and burning sensation. Like I said one more time beware. Do not buy this product ever, if you have sensitive skin. Now I'm stuck with this, what a waist of money
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used a different face primer before that had a smell to it that I didn't quite like. So, I decided to try ELF out. I was pleasantly surprised about how smoothly it went on. The texture is in between a gel and a lotion. You can, however, feel it sitting on your skin when you apply it. Therefore, it is not very lightweight. There was no unpleasant smell. I haven't seen any additional problems with my skin after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the awful smell...I try to use it but is impossible smell like is old or expired..but the product was ok wasn't expired...I bought it before in the pharmacy and was good...that is why I got it in Amazon but wasn't the same.... delivery was fast ...but because of the smell I have to give it 1 🌟.....
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Valverde

customer_reviews.title: The BIG problem with this product is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The BIG problem with this product is that it is DECEIVING!! It is such a small amount. reduce the packing and give me more product. I will pay a little more. This is the complaint from all the users. MORE PRODUCT less fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dermatitis, and facial skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin from dermatitis and have issues with products with fragrences on my face. This product is ridiculously awesome. I was using the Loreal Hydrating primer before this and it doesnt even compare. A little goes a long way. I wait about 30 mins to put make up on after applying it. It makes my foundation blend flawlessly and i have a healthy glow look after, but not greasy. I love it and i even use it if im not going to apply makeup. My face has never felt so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS NOW Best Primer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a primer on my face before, I have always used unscented light and non grease lotion. Not anymore! This stuff is the most amazing product I have every put on my face! It's so soft, smooth, velvety, and it's leave my face feeling like it did when I was 20...I'm almost 50 now and not ashamed to say it! I am going to advise all my family and friends to try this, again it's just amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa MW2003

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I don't use it all over my face because I have oily to combination skin, but I do use it for an extremely dry, flaky patch on my cheek and it works wonders. Before I got this I would try putting a lot of jojoba oil on that patch of skin prior to putting make up on, but it still ended up looking like my skin was peeling off. But a tiny little dab of this on that pesky troublesome area, and it fixes it right away. This and the poreless primer will remain part of my make up routine forever!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not beginner friendly..
customer_reviews.text: I am new to make up so please forgive my ignorance. I tried using this primer as I have slightly dry skin in certain areas. I found this primer made my lines and pores more pronounced. However, I don’t think I can accurately pinpoint that this is the primer’s fault 100% because I’ve had my foundation for longer than I probably should have. I will keep trying when I get a new foundation. But I’m not giving up because I do love E.L.F!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: best affordable primer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the poreless version of ELF primer but I ran out so I decided to order this one for a change. I think both are very effective in priming my face before makeup. I don't like when foundations sink in through your skin and this gives it a thin but great coverage from clogged pores. Now I can't use foundation without priming my skin with this very affordable primer!
customer_reviews.author: JLim

customer_reviews.title: not only my favorite primer but favorite beauty product.
customer_reviews.text: I use everything from NYC to LA Mer. This is hands down not only my favorite primer but favorite beauty product. I'm now hoarding it so when more realize what a treat this is (feels wonderful, SLIGHTLY scented, makes any foundation glide on). Already, I have noticed the turn stile ELF displays often run put of this. Great price. Btw, I have extremely dry skin and use over my moisturizer. Let each application (moisturizer, primer, foundation) "set"a few minutes in between
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Creamy Clear Primer by ELF.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer. It's very creamy and lightweight. It doesn't really have a scent. It goes on so buttery smooth and is clear too. The packaging is beautiful and it leaves me with a subtle glow that I love. And it's only 6 dollars. I do have other favorites as far as primer goes but this one is good too. I wish it did more for large pores but this isn't the pore refining one so that's prob why. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Cox

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Elf Product
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 and have never used a primer, but have used Elf products. Came across this primer and the reviews and price convinced me to try it. I was amazed that my skin looked so smooth and pores and fine lines less visible. I have used it with and without foundation. I will definitely re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: It's is GREAT for people with dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product in the mail and have put it on ! It's is GREAT for people with dry skin. My makeup used to come off flaky when I put on BB Cream but it is now much much more moisturized for a smooth look. The only reason why I would give this product 4 stars instead of 5 (probably deserves a 4.5) is because there really is not that much in the bottle. As another review mentioned, the bottle is deceiving (just look at the bottom and you can see it does not fill all the way). Nonetheless, for the price, it is not too bad of a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hwang

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED 😔  ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This product is not a primer. You’re makeup comes right off. It came off faster than when I wore makeup. I would not even give this one star but you have to rate it. Do not buy. You will be very disappointed as I was. It does feel silky when applying but it IS NOT A PRIMER Your makeup will kit stay on.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: STALE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Stale product...contains Gravesend oil,which apparently has gone rancid...smells funky.This is actually a good product...have bought before in store,but they need to consider adding an expiration date...have bought stale product at store also...otherwise works great and provides moisturized canvas for foundation
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This had an awful smell to it. It spelled expired & I could not use it. I know someone said that they weren’t able to return it,because it says on there you can’t. What I did was call customer service & they refunded me my money back. Don’t buy if you don’t want to risk it not working.
customer_reviews.author: jimenav

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expensive primer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product every day since it's come in. Well, last night I discovered my Tarte primer, that I'd previously used, had a little bit left in the tube. I used what was left of Tarte this morning. My God, what a difference. ELF is far superior. This product quickly became a staple. I 100% recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I like this formula a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have such sensitive skin, it can be hard to find a primer that isn't too heavy. I like this formula a lot. However, it does seem to sink into some parts of my skin and not others (combination skin), and I notice as the day goes on I can get a few splotches where the makeup didn't set as well to it (even after using a setting powder and spray as well), and some of the dry spots on my face get a bit flaky after 8-10 hours or so sometimes. I just bring it with me and reapply when I notice this happening or try to smooth it out with a lightweight moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: didn't like the smell
customer_reviews.text: didn't like the smell. It wasn't super strong and faded fairly quickly. Other than that it makes your face feel like really smooth and soft
customer_reviews.author: ellen monette

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Slippery times ahead
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin with dry patches and was hoping this would help my foundation look better on the dry patches....negative. It is hydrating...like an oil slick hydrating. It was just too much to the point that my makeup was sliding off and wiping off on everything. This primer would be great for anyone with super, super dry skin. If you have the least bit of oiliness you'll want to pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: H. MilesTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the WORST primer ever
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the WORST primer ever. It has a really weird scent, like gasoline and I can't even explain how it feels and leaves the skins. It's super greasy, leaves you with this melted buttery look and it's just horrible. I applied it, inmediately remove it and went directly to the trash can. 0 stars and 0 recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Greasy Feeling
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this face primer. It is very heavy and greasy feeling on my skin. My makeup just smears over the top of it instead of sticking to it like other primers I have used. I guess this would be fine if you are just using a powder over it, but not if you want to use full foundation with it. It smells okay, but it made me break out because it doesn't really absorb into the skin. Overall I was very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: Once again, after buying beauty products that are allegedly supposed to be dupes for high end cosmetics, I’ve been let down. I’ve heard great things about this primer, but it just did not work for me. I have combo/dry skin and I thought this would be a great primer for that. I did not see any significant difference in the longevity of my makeup. The consistency feels like a silicone-y and oily texture. Normally, silicone primers dry/set on your skin but this one has a very oily texture that just does not go away or set on the skin. It doesn’t feel tacky either, just oily. I suppose for only a few dollars what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: It made my skin look and feel like a dream
customer_reviews.text: It made my skin look and feel like a dream. I do tend to get dry in the winter so next time I will NOT forget to moisturize first. Please don't miss that step. But it was very surprisingly awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food for thought.
customer_reviews.text: Kay so i loved this. But i think it made me break out. First i blamed my new foundation.. So i stopped using both for a week and washed good everyday until my face began to clear up. And now im using the same foundation and no primer or a different one and no break outs. I won't swear on it but if anyone else starts to think its causing break outs should try stopping=] and seeing what happens. 3 stars cause i like it how my makeup looks when its done. But ya it won't set your face either.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  Non returnable and smells rancid and is greasy.  Trashing it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would have to worry about buying products off Amazon that smell rancid and are non returnable. Decided to try a face primer and chose the ELF primer as a starter. It is greasy and smells rancid. Going in the trash and not on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy feel
customer_reviews.text: I have mature, dry aging skin and was looking for a primer that wasn't drying. E.l.f hydrating primer was NOT the answer. It left my face like an oil slick. Tried it numerous ways i.e. didn't use moisturizer, let it set 15 minutes, but my skin was too greasy to apply a moisturizer on top of this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Oily and Slick
customer_reviews.text: First, I think this is probably a great primer if you need SUPER HYDRATION. I usually do but this is too much even for me. The best way to describe is that it leaves my face feeling oily immediately. I do have very dry, flaky skin and I want to love this product. That said the "slick" feel on my skin and the fact that it doesn't seem to help my makeup wear long/well makes it a 2-star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Life Out Loud

customer_reviews.title: Silky with Good Coverage of pores and light wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face primer for BB Cream or Foundation. Feels very silky and not cakey at all. Takes a few minutes to dry before you can apply BB Cream, liquid or powder foundation. I used this first, then applied tinted BB Cream and a light dusting of Powder. Really helps to cover those pores so your foundation goes on much smoother. Would recommend for use for light wrinkles and pore coverage. A little goes a long way, so it's cost effective also.
customer_reviews.author: Houston TX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I use primer from an top brand out there, and pay a fortune for it, so I decided to try this brand, and honestly I can't tell the difference. This is a wonderful product, I highly recommend it. I have just recently purchased the moisturizing version of this but I haven't received it yet. The price is awesome I can buy 14 bottles of this for the same price I was paying for one of the brand I was using!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, not so great smell
customer_reviews.text: The scent smells like Vaseline or something. Wasn’t really into that. A little goes a long way and for what’s it worth it works pretty good. Immediately when I put it on I felt the difference. (This is my first time using primer) didn’t help so much with keeping my face less oily but it still applied my foundation really good
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like it moisutrizes my face deep down. It just kind of acts like a sticky top layer. With the foundation i'm currently using it kind of goes on and accents my dry areas so that's why I don't feel like it is very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: A great moisturizing product to add to your beauty routine
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. Nice and smooth, enhances my BBC cream. I use this more during colder weather and switch to the lighter "Pink" version in the hotter weather. I like both, but this one's extra nice if your skin needs moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Curiously Strong

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter primer, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The feeling of this primer going onto the skin was soft, but wasn't as creamy as I would have liked. I prefer the MAC primer I was using prior, I was just looking for something a little more economical. This felt greasy to me. That being said, it did the job decent enough for the price. In the end, I had to stop using it because it made me break out. I won't buy it again, but that doesn't mean it's not fine for someone else. I would suggest it to someone who doesn't have acne prone skin, or who is looking to try their first inexpensive primer
customer_reviews.author: JoVigg

customer_reviews.title: Great primer, bottle size..not so much.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say, I really like this primer..however, the bottle is completely misleading. The bottle size makes it seem like you are getting much more thsn the .47 fluid ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Roma S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from Walmart and LOVE it. However, ordered from here and when I went to use it the smell was so bad I started gagging. Put it on my face and it was pure grease & had these flakes forming literally don’t understand. I have been using this primer for over a year. Please do not order from amazing. Buy in stores. I had to wash my face it smelled so bad. GROSS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It feels very nice on my skin, its not meant for moisturizing, but just for priming the skin for your makeup. There is no scent, which I love! However, it doesn't seem to have my makeup staying on all day, which kind of defeats the purpose of it.
customer_reviews.author: KJean

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good primer but it's quite moisturizing. I already have routine of moisturizer already so this is more for like if you don't have a moisturizer in your routine but if you have really dry skin this will be good for you. Makeup holds up well and nothing bad occurs, it smooths but doesn't really blur. It's nice tho and a lot goes a long way.. So this will last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Colton

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Glides on easily. Non toxic is a plus. All of these primers clog pores to one extent or another no getting around that. Otherwise pleased with the product. Have found that spending way more is just not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin very oily in a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: At first I was really happy about the hydration I felt with this primer. I used Mac foundation over it. I wanted to find a replacement for my Mac primer which makes my skin look dry and flaky. I am not sure if I had too much of this product on, but after a couple hours my skin was sooo greasy. I have not seen my skin so oily in a very long time and hence I am not too excited about using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I love elf products! They have some of the best dupes for cheap. However, this product is not one that I would recommend to others. First, the packaging is very misleading, inside the blue/green tube is a tube of the real product which is much smaller. Disappointing to say the least. The product itself is just... ok. I know it's hydrating but it seemed pretty watery and ended up having my makeup slide right off, even with setting powder. It also seemed that it made my pores look huge.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Formula seems to have changed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time making this purchase and it seems as though the formulation has changed, the first order was perfect, it was greaseless and had an almost invisible quality about it when applying, this second one is oily, I will buy my next one from the drugstore and see if it’s like the first one
customer_reviews.author: TheTallCute1

customer_reviews.title: Feels oily, smells funny
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer-- I'm using my dad's Amazon account to write this review I know that elf is a trusted makeup brand so I decided to try their primer. I have to say I'm very disappointed. It smells awful, I can't even describe it. Almost like petroleum jelly but worse. It felt like petroleum jelly too. When I put it on my face it made it feel oily and it took forever for it to wash off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use on my medium to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use everyday with make-up. My skin is a bit on the medium to dry skin so this great before I add product to my face. It is a little greasy on my fingers but absorbs great on the skin as soon as I put on. I use it under both types, liquid and mineral foundations. Wished it lasted a bit longer. Packaging makes it look like a bigger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: JoannaG

customer_reviews.title: Dries out my forehead but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: This primer seemed great. It's supposed to be hydrating which is why I bought it. All the primer's I've used in the past dry out my skin on my forehead and between my eyes. I thought this one would be different. But it's not. It also dries out my forehead. If this is a problem you know you already have, then chances are this primer is not the primer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Iplish

customer_reviews.title: You will never meet another moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is my most favorite primer. I no longer have to reapply makeup during the day it has my skin feeling supple and soft and luxurious and I just love it. It helps with dark spots crow's-feet everything it's all in one for me I adore this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V. Atterberry

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It feels kinda powdery or silky once rubbed on to the skin. It feels good but doesnt help my make up to go easier. Coconut Oil works better then anything else I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily or combination skin imo
customer_reviews.text: This primer is just a little too greasy. Maybe it's better for someone with super dry skin, but I didn't like it; I have combination to oily skin. Made my face feel super oily. Honestly feels like a knock off of the Smashbox photo finish primer which feels a lot better. I normally like ELF but this was a miss.
customer_reviews.author: SLD_615

customer_reviews.title: You do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This makes your skin feel nice and smooth. I'm not really sure how well it hydrates. The packaging is very very deceiving. It looks like you have a sizable bottle of primer, but if you unscrew the silver part, you'll find it's just a teeny tiny little bottle. I guess, maybe I would have figured that out if I looked at the amount in bottle and not just the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jemangela

customer_reviews.title: Love this product from the drugstore but something went wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I get this product from my local drugstore all the time but this time around I didn't have time to run to the store so I got it off Amazon! It looks fine but the only problem I had was that the contents weren't mixed as they normally are and it was spitting out liquid that it usually doesn't. All in all though it still worked just fine just had to pump out a bunch of liquid before it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: The primer works
customer_reviews.text: First time using this brand of primer and it seems to work. I've used the primer from Ulta and it leaves my skin oily and shiny. I also tend to break out. Using this Elf Primer, I don't have that issue. My makeup goes on nice after putting some on and I dont feel it on my face. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: StephSid09

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am not new to makeup (at 48 years old) but new to trying to do it better. I had no idea what a primer was or exactly the purpose but figured I would try it. I found this one by E.l.f. and liked that it was cruelty free and not very expensive. I had been using it it for a while and I didn't really notice much of a difference until one day I forgot to use it. As soon as I put on my foundation I could see how huge my pores looked without the primer. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Peace feline

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a product to help keep make up from looking flaky (dry skin and dry heat in Arizona). Recently had skin surgery (on nose) and am learning how to cover up with heavy duty foundation (Dermacol) and this makes it go on easier and smoother than I expected. Really like E.l.f. products.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L.

product_meta.title: e.l.f. Hydrating Face Primer for use as a Foundation for Your Makeup, Vitamin Infused Formula.47 Ounces
product_meta.description: The perfect makeup starts with the perfect primer. Made with grape and Vitamins A, C, and E, our hydrating primer gives you a smooth, flawless canvas for long-lasting makeup application. Great for illuminating your skin and minimizing pores prior to applying cosmetics. elf Cosmetics offers a complete line of vegan and cruelty-free makeup and professional tools—all at an extraordinary value price, so there is sure to be something for everyone. See bullets and images for more information.
feature_bullets: CREATE A FLAWLESS BASE FOR YOUR MAKEUP Our hydrating primer transforms your face into a flawless, smooth canvas ideal for long-lasting makeup application. Great for smoothing, illuminating, and minimizing pores prior to cosmetics.
VITAMIN INFUSED SKIN CONDITIONER This formula is infused with grape and Vitamins A, C, and E to help boost your complexion and hydrate your skin for a fresh, professional look.
HOW TO USE Apply to clean, moisturized skin prior to makeup application. Use a small amount and blend evenly on your face. Concentrate on areas of dryness for added hydration.

AT e.l.f. COSMETICS, we believe that beauty comes from within all of us, and our products are designed to let your inner beauty shine through. We offer luxurious cosmetics made with quality ingredients that are perfect for women of any age.
CRUELTY FREE AND VEGAN Our primers are PETA certified cruelty free and vegan, so you can feel good about using our products.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
